Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_AnimalToMonster
Text.Desc: Dead animals may transform into monsters.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_ElixirGas
Text.Desc: Successful alchemy boosts the Five Elements Alchemy Qi in the area, offering varied effects based on proportions

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_LifeLost
Text.Desc: Eating medicine results in less Medicine Tolerance, but the character's Lifespan will deplete at 100 times the speed.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_AncientStoneChest
Text.Desc: Greatly increases the chance of digging out an ancient casket, but doing so will kill the mining disciple.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_LinQiSurge
Text.Desc: Each weather change is accompanied by a Burst of Qi, but changing the weather will cost a life.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_GoodsExpensiveButSuppliesCheaper
Text.Desc: Merchant selling price is halved, purchasing price is doubled, but within a single merchant cycle, goods become more expensive the more you buy, and materials become cheaper the more you sell.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_FiveElementsRelationChange
Text.Desc: The Five Elements generation and overcoming relationship is reversed once.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_CantDrawFuAndRandomFu
Text.Desc: Cannot manually draw talismans, but drawing talismans will yield random results. Characters can activate more talismans.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_RefineMustSuccess
Text.Desc: Refinement is guaranteed to succeed, but it consumes more resources.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_NpcAvoidDangerAutomatically
Text.Desc: Gaining favor from other cultivators is greatly increased, and one can directly break through mental defenses, but other cultivators will also automatically avoid danger.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_RealTime
Text.Desc: The trigger days for all secret events are shortened to 1/3, and disciples' time stationed outside will become actual time.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_SupplyBox
Text.Desc: Map fog is automatically eliminated. Unable to obtain yields from butchering, harvesting, mining, or chopping, but supply crates will fall from the sky daily.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_GetGoodBadScoreRandom
Text.Desc: When acquiring reputation through various means, the acquired reputation is randomly positive or negative, and the multiplier for acquiring reputation ranges randomly from 0.1 to 10.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_UnlockGong
Text.Desc: The foundation value required for Foundation Training, and the cultivation value needed for practice, are multipled by 5. All laws are now opened to all cultivators.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_Yang
Text.Desc: Sect Feng Shui is permanently at the highest, base spirit gathering effect increases by 100 points, all plots gain fire and wood attributes, but the map's base temperature rises by 20°.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_Yin
Text.Desc: Sect Feng Shui is permanently at the highest, base spirit gathering effect increases by 100 points, all plots gain metal and water attributes, but the map's base temperature decreases by 20°.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_Hunter_1
Text.Desc: After hunting several rabbits, a rare item emerged.
Text.SpecialDesc: After several rabbits hunted by the sect disciples, a [TARGET] appeared!

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_Hunter_2
Text.Desc: After hunting several wolves, a rare item appeared.
Text.SpecialDesc: Upon Sect disciples hunting several wolves, a [TARGET] emerges!

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_Hunter_3
Text.Desc: After hunting several bears, a rare item appeared.
Text.SpecialDesc: Upon Sect disciples hunting several bears, a [TARGET] emerges!

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_Hunter_4
Text.Desc: After hunting several turtles, a rare item appeared.
Text.SpecialDesc: Upon Sect disciples hunting several turtles, a [TARGET] emerges!

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_Hunter_5
Text.Desc: After hunting several tigers, a rare item appeared.
Text.SpecialDesc: Upon Sect disciples hunting several tigers, a [TARGET] emerges!

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_Hunter_6
Text.Desc: After hunting several cows, a rare item appeared.
Text.SpecialDesc: Upon Sect disciples hunting several cows, a [TARGET] emerges!

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_Hunter_7
Text.Desc: After hunting several chickens, a rare item appeared.
Text.SpecialDesc: Upon Sect disciples hunting several chickens, a [TARGET] emerges!

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_Hunter_8
Text.Desc: After hunting several snakes, a rare item appeared.
Text.SpecialDesc: Upon Sect disciples hunting several snakes, a [TARGET] emerges!

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_GetItem_1
Text.Desc: Acquired several rare treasures, but all Sects' favor towards us plummeted.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_OuterDiscipleRoomDemand
Text.Desc: Outer disciples gain flight ability, but their room requirements increase.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_GetItem_2
Text.Desc: Obtain a Rare Item
Text.SpecialDesc: With the surge in Sect Reputation, a [TARGET] materializes!

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_Sacrific
Text.Desc: Start Beast Sacrifice

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_GetSchoolRelation
Text.Desc: Provoke the anger of the Ten Thousand Demon Palace
Text.SpecialDesc: Sacrificing demons enrages the Demon Palace

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_FengShuiChange
Text.Desc: All sect disciples are naturally gifted, with all abilities +2 (increase cap), but your sect suffers from divine jealousy, making all relics permanently adverse.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_ModifierChange_1
Text.Desc: Sect disciples' learning ability enhances, alchemy skills +5 (cap increased)

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_ModifierChange_2
Text.Desc: Sect disciples' adventure-related abilities drop significantly, but weapon forging skill +5 (raises upper limit).

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_ModifierChange_3
Text.Desc: Sect disciples' Artisanry skill +5 (increases cap).

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_ModifierChange_4
Text.Desc: Mental state bonus significantly decreases; Social skill +5 (increases cap).

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_ModifierChange_5
Text.Desc: Sect disciples' manual skills significantly decreased, construction skill +10, mining skill +10.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_ModifierChange_6
Text.Desc: Sect disciples' social skills -5, battle skills +5 (cap increased)

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_ModifierChange_7
Text.Desc: Sect disciples more prone to hunger and fatigue (Qi Sense +10).

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_ModifierChange_8
Text.Desc: Sect disciples gain +50 lifespan, optimal/maximum temperature tolerance -10/-20.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_ModifierChange_9
Text.Desc: Sect disciples' Qi cap rises, advancing all heavenly tribulations by 70%

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_ModifierChange_10
Text.Desc: Sect disciples' battle skills -5, protection skills +5 (cap increased)

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_ModifierChange_11
Text.Desc: Sect disciples' practice speed drops significantly, but technique skills +10 (raises upper limit).

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_ModifierChange_12
Text.Desc: Sect disciples significantly boost their Foundation Training and cultivation speed in a short time.
Text.SpecialDesc: [NPC]'s ascension significantly boosts the foundation establishment speed and cultivation speed of all sect disciples in the short term.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_ModifierChange_13
Text.Desc: Sect disciples experience a significant reduction in Foundation Training and Cultivation speed.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_ModifierChange_14
Text.Desc: Sect disciples' learning speed significantly decreases, artifact mastery skills +5 (cap increased)

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Constant_GetStageValue_1
Text.Desc: Gain Cultivation
Text.SpecialDesc: [NPC]'s cultivation greatly increases after completing the kill.
